desc: Your mother watched over your training since childhood. As a result, your body is in a great condition.
You inherited your mother's strength. Melee weapons deal more damage than usual.
You know a lot about lesbians from your Amazon mother. Lesbian characters will not reject you due to your gender, and your oral skill is pretty good.
Your mother was a muscular woman with huge knockers. Fortunately, you have inherited only her muscles.
Noble blood gives you certain perks.
The dragon blood is too thin to influence the looks, but it still makes melee weapons a bit less effective.
Your body is covered with tiny flakes. They are almost inconspicuous, but upon impact they become solid as stone, softening the blow.
Your body is covered with tiny flakes. They are almost inconspicuous, but at higher temperatures they actively absorb and dissipate heat, making fire and, to some extent, electricity ineffective.
Your body is covered with tiny flakes. They are almost inconspicuous, but they can make certain parts of your skin scabrous, which helps during intimacy.
All equipment penalties to agility are less than usual.
All swords are a bit more powerful than usual.

Incest is extremely common in royal families, and you know a lot about it from your mother stories. Characters with Half-Sister trait will not reject you due to kinship and will have additional disposition bonus.
Your mother was an elf from the deep bowels of the earth. You have inherited her mobility and flexibility.
You know a lot about poisons from your mother. Poison are much less effective against you, and your poison attacks much are stronger.
All daggers are a bit more powerful than usual.
You inherited your mother's affinity to the nature. Healing spells work better on you, while earth and wind deal less damage.
All bows are a bit more powerful than usual.
You know a lot about surviving outside of the city from your parents. Your exploration skills are second to none.
Due to your ancestry, the certain part of your body is a bit thinner than you would like. That makes anal sex much easier, but you have to try harder in the other hole.
All Fae are naturally resistant to most forms of magic. Magic is not very effective against you, including healing spells.
Your body inherited some of your mother's unchangeability. You body restores some health every day, but healing items are almost ineffective.
